title: Werewolves of Shade Part Five
description: ***This book was previously published as ‘The Beautiful Immortals’ (The Mila Watson Series) but at the request of fans is now published again here in its original serialized format***From Tim O'Rourke #1 bestselling author of 'The Kiera Hudson Series' comes 'Werewolves of Shade' a werewolf romance with a twist.When Mila Watson decides to investigate her parents’ unexpected disappearance, she sets off into the mountains, heading for a remote village where the townsfolk all vanished some years ago. But on reaching the village, Mila soon discovers that it isn't as deserted as she first believed. Hiding out there is a small community of strange people. But who and what are these people hiding from?Determined to discover the truth about her parents, Mila befriends a young man, named Rush. As they grow closer, Mila begins to suspect that it isn’t only Rush and his people who inhabit the isolated village but something else lives there, too. Someone or something is waiting in the woods that surround the village. But what is it that hides in the shadows? Vampires? Werewolves? Witches? Perhaps all three? Whatever lurks there, Mila needs to find out if she is to discover the truth surrounding the mysterious disappearance of her parents.'Werewolves of Shade' is a six part serial. Each part is approx. 20,000 words in length. This ends on an unbearable cliff-hanger. Part Six is now available!
author: Tim O'Rourke
